Archetypes.1: Is your character an innocent and wants to live a happy and complete life filled with love?
Archetypes.2: Is your character an innocent victim of a much bigger plot ruled by other’s desires?
Archetypes.3: Does your character end up dying at the end?

Archetypes.1: Is your character an average Joe in a world of extraordinary people?
Archetypes.2: Does he or she fear being excluded and often try to harder than others to fit in?

Archetypes.1: Does he or she believe that where there is a will, there's a way?
Archetypes.2: Does your character always stand up for what is right and look for battles to improve their own skill? Is he or she afraid of being weak?
Archetypes.3: Is your character the hero of their story?

Archetypes.1: Is your character the voice of reason in her group?
Archetypes.2: Does he or she come from humble beginnings and care for everyone in their group?
Archetypes.3: Does your character fear being considered selfish by society and being abused for their kindness?

Archetypes.1: Does your character have a certain disregard for the rules? Is reckless their middle name?
Archetypes.2: Does your character believe in taking revenge or starting a revolution?
Archetypes.3: Does your character go too far in their quest for revenge? Do they become what they set out to stop?
Archetypes.4: Is your character afraid of being powerless?

Archetypes.1: Is your character deeply in love or falls in love with the main character of the story?
Archetypes.2: Can your character be considered clingy and overly affectionate despite the fact that their love comes from a good place?
Archetypes.3: Is your character’s love manipulated by other characters to achieve their objectives?

Archetypes.1: Does you character believe that you only live once and tries to live every moment to its fullest?
Archetypes.2: Does your character try to lighten the mood using humor and often gain an equal footing with someone more educated through their wit alone?

Archetypes.1: Does your character appear as an all knowing sage that uses his or her wisdom to help the main character?
Archetypes.2: Does your character call the main character of the story to action (often pertaining to some loose ends left by them)?
Archetypes.3: Is your character a father figure for the main character?

Archetypes.1: Does your character believe that power isn’t everything, it’s the only thing?
Archetypes.2: Does your character want to establish peace (in their own twisted way) while maintaining their control over everything?
Archetypes.3: Is your character afraid of an uprising and does everything in their power to maintain control?
Archetypes.4: Is your character willing to sacrifice anything to gain power?

Archetypes.1: Does your character end up being an antagonist to the main character despite not having any direct motive to slay the main character?
Archetypes.2: Is your character an underling to the main villain?

Characters.Name: Hamlet
Characters.Question: Is your character cursed with indecision and doomed to recite long soliloquies about himself?

Characters.Name: Ophelia
Characters.Question: Does your character have a tendency to look for approval from his/her dad or brother?

Characters.Name:
Old
Hamlet
Characters.Question: Does your character come back from the after life to warn about a great evil?

Characters.Name: Claudius
Characters.Question: Is your character a very cunning politician?

Characters.Name: Gertrude
Characters.Question: Does your character possess a lot of underlying political power?

Characters.Name: Polonius
Characters.Question: Is your character known for using too many syllables to explain the simplest of things?

Characters.Name: Laertes
Characters.Question: Is your character suspiciously overprotective of her sister?

Rosencrantz
&
Guildenstern
Characters.Question: Is your character a duo of two average friends looking to make a buck and save a friend?

Anakin 
Skywalker

Darth
Vader

Characters.Question: Is your character a female politician with great knowledge of the empire?

Kenobi
Characters.Question: Is your character tasked with training the one who shall one day restore balance to the force?

Han

Luke
Skywalker
Characters.Question: Does your character famously comes to know his father with the phrase '... I am your father'?

Characters.Question: Speak like this, does your character?

Potter
Characters.Question: Does your character possess all three gifts from the deathly hallows?

Weasley
Characters.Question: Is your character a part of a large family with each member possessing red hair?

Characters.Question: Is your character lacking a nose?

Granger

Characters.Question: Is your character the first ever vegetarian lion?

Mufasa
Characters.Question: Is your character the king of pride rock?

Characters.Question: Is your character famously known for holding young lions over a tall ledge?

Characters.Name: Scar
Characters.Question: Is your character in charge of freakishly huge army of hyenas?

Characters.Question: Is your character a childhood friend of the future king of pride rock?

Pumba &
